=Aeroplane - Setup guide (V1.1 Beta 8)=

This guide presumes all values have been reset to their factory default values, for a quick and easy setup process, from 'factory reset' to 'ready to fly'.

==1. Factory reset==

 # Hold down all four buttons while powering up the KK2 board,
 # A "Reset" message will briefly appear on the screen after the OpenAero2 logo is displayed,
 # Release all buttons once the red LED has blinked,
 # OpenAero will continue to display the status screen.

==2. Mixer Preset==

General, Mode - Aeroplane or Flying-wing

==3. KK2 Board Orientation==

General, Orientation - Horizontal, Vertical or Upside-down

==4. Receiver setup==

RC setup

 # RX mode - PWM1, PWM2, PWM3 or CCPM - PWM1 defauts to rudder channel
 # CPPM order - JR/Spk or Futaba - 
 # Stab input - Optional - Gear for PWM
 # Autolevel input - Optional - Gear for PWM
 # 2nd Aileron - Aileron or remap throttle input for PWM

==5. Stick Calibration==

RC Inputs, Calibrate

CPPM throttle at 50%
